Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found at #Death Mountain Crater#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Gerudo Card#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #the Serenade of Water#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Saria's House#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Grounds# hoards #Epona's Song#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Ice Cavern# hoards #the Lens of Truth#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Bomb Bag#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Bombchu Shop#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Goron Tunic#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Bow#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Man in Green's House#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Boss Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Ice Cavern# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Ganon's Castle# hoards #Din's Fire#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Saria's Song# can be found at #Goron City#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Boss Key# can be found at #Goron City#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Boss Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Slingshot#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #an Ice Trap#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Shadow Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
